title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
Are pesky flies ruining your indoor or outdoor space? Look no further than the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster! This incredible product comes in a pack of 3, each 30 feet long, pre-baited and ready to use. The sticky adhesive barn paper sheet is scented with a green color, making it attractive to insects without being harmful to you or your pets. 

Suitable for use in residential, commercial, industrial, barns, waste rooms, and animal farms, this non-toxic trap is effective in damp, humid, and normal conditions, lasting up to a full year. With a coverage area of 3600 square inches, this trap is perfect for high infestation areas. 

Don't let flies take over your space, take control with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster and experience intelligent pest management at its finest!

Introducing the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - your ultimate solution to pesky bug and insect infestations! With 3 packs, each spanning an impressive 30 feet, these pre-baited traps are ready to use both indoors and outdoors. The scented green color attracts insects while the sticky adhesive barn paper sheet ensures they stay put. Disposable and non-toxic, these traps can cover a whopping 3600 square inches of space, making them perfect for residential, commercial, industrial, barns, waste rooms, and animal farms. Say goodbye to unwanted pests with our Giant Fly Glue Trap - the smart choice for intelligent pest management.

With coverage for up to 3600 square inches and a longevity of up to one year, this trap is perfect for residential, commercial, industrial, barns, waste rooms, and animal farms.
